marytts.cart
Class DecisionNode.ByteDecisionNode

java.lang.Object
  marytts.cart.Node
      marytts.cart.DecisionNode
          marytts.cart.DecisionNode.ByteDecisionNode
Enclosing class:
DecisionNode
public static class DecisionNode.ByteDecisionNode
extends DecisionNode

An decision Node with an arbitrary number of daughters. Value of the target corresponds to the index number of next daughter.
